name: puter
description: Puter is a self-hosted browser-based desktop environment that simulates a full operating system in the browser. It includes a virtual file system, apps, terminal, desktop, and multi-user support.

features.title: Folder Organization
features.description: Store and organize files in a cloud-like file system with folders and permissions

features.title: Rich Text Editor
features.description: Use pre-installed apps including text editor, terminal, file manager, and media player

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Create separate user accounts with isolated environments and file storage

features.title: File Sharing
features.description: Share files and folders with other users or generate public download links
